Package org.neo4j.internal.recordstorage

Interface RecordAccess<RECORD,​ADDITIONAL>

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DirectRecordAccess, RecordChanges
    public interface RecordAccess<RECORD,​ADDITIONAL>
    Provides access to records, both for reading and for writing.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface Description
      static interface  RecordAccess.Loader<RECORD,​ADDITIONAL>
      Hook for loading and creating records.
      static interface  RecordAccess.RecordProxy<RECORD,​ADDITIONAL>
      A proxy for a record that encapsulates load/store actions to take, knowing when the underlying record is requested for reading or for writing.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      Gets an already loaded record, or loads it as part of this call if it wasn't.
      RecordAccess.RecordProxy<RECORD,​ADDITIONAL> setRecord​(long key, RECORD record, ADDITIONAL additionalData, PageCursorTracer cursorTracer)  

    • Method Detail

      • getOrLoad

        RecordAccess.RecordProxy<RECORD,​ADDITIONAL> getOrLoad​(long key,
                                                            ADDITIONAL additionalData,
                                                            PageCursorTracer cursorTracer)
        Gets an already loaded record, or loads it as part of this call if it wasn't. The RecordAccess.RecordProxy returned has means of communicating when to get access to the actual record for reading or writing. With that information any additional loading or storing can be inferred for the specific use case (implementation).
        Parameters:
        key - the record key.
        additionalData - additional data to put in the record after loaded.
        Returns:
        a RecordAccess.RecordProxy for the record for key.

      • getIfLoaded

        RecordAccess.RecordProxy<RECORD,​ADDITIONAL> getIfLoaded​(long key)

      • setRecord

        RecordAccess.RecordProxy<RECORD,​ADDITIONAL> setRecord​(long key,
                                                            RECORD record,
                                                            ADDITIONAL additionalData,
                                                            PageCursorTracer cursorTracer)

      • create

        RecordAccess.RecordProxy<RECORD,​ADDITIONAL> create​(long key,
                                                         ADDITIONAL additionalData,
                                                         PageCursorTracer cursorTracer)
        Creates a new record with the given key. Any additionalData is set in the record before returning.
        Parameters:
        key - the record key.
        additionalData - additional data to put in the record after loaded.
        Returns:
        a RecordAccess.RecordProxy for the record for key.

      • changeSize

        int changeSize()

      • changes

        Collection<? extends RecordAccess.RecordProxy<RECORD,​ADDITIONAL>> changes()
